findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by enabling the rewards pool.

findings.title: MTS - Manipulate Total Supply
findings.description: The contract manipulates the total supply on every transaction, decreasing it by 3% of each transaction, which may lead to a total supply less than user balances.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unnecessary code and optimize contract performance.
